Test Name: Neisseria gonorrhoeae / Chlamydia trachomatis Nucleic Acid Amplification Test (NAAT)
Purpose: To detect and differentiate N. gonorrhoeae and C. trachomatis by nucleic acid amplification for accurate clinical diagnosis.
Equipment: Real-time PCR thermocycler, automated nucleic acid extraction system, vortex mixer, centrifuge, biosafety cabinet
